data.title: California drought action
data.author: Admin
data.excerpt: State actions against drought July 8, 2021 Governor Newsom calls on Californians to reduce water use by 15% to help protect water reserves if drought conditions continue. Drought emergency proclamations expanded to include Inyo, Marin, Mono, Monterey, San Luis Obispo, San Mateo, Santa Barbara, Santa Clara and Santa Cruz counties. May 10, 2021 Governor Gavin … Read more

_genesis_description: Learn more about current drought conditions, the state’s drought response, and how Californians can save water.
_open_graph_description: Learn more about current conditions, the state’s response and informational resources available to the public.
